Notes.Text:
This update for mgetty fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-1010190: Fixed a denial of service which could be caused by a local attacker in putwhitespan() (bsc#1142770).
- Fixed a permission issue which have resulted in build failures (bsc#1168170).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: mgetty prior to 1.2.1 is affected by: out-of-bounds read. The impact is: DoS, the program may crash if the memory is not mapped. The component is: putwhitespan() in g3/pbm2g3.c. The attack vector is: Local, the victim must open a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: 1.2.1.
